Package org.neo4j.kernel.database

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatabaseCreationContext  
    DatabaseIdRepository
    Encapsulates the retrieval of a persistent NamedDatabaseId for a database of a given name.
    DatabaseIdRepository.Caching  
    DatabaseStartupController
    Controller that checked during database startup to react on incoming stop/shutdown requests.
    LogEntryWriterFactory
    The LogEntryWriterFactory is responsible for picking the transaction log format version to use for LogEntryWriters.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Database  
    DatabaseFileHelper  
    DatabaseId  
    DatabaseIdFactory  
    DatabaseKernelModule  
    DatabaseMemoryTrackers  
    DatabaseTracers  
    DatabaseTransactionLogModule  
    DbmsLogEntryWriterFactory  
    DefaultForceOperation  
    GlobalAvailabilityGuardController  
    MapCachingDatabaseIdRepository  
    NamedDatabaseId
    Represents a unique identifier for a database, including a persistent and immutable component.
    SystemDbDatabaseIdRepository
